name: Asteroid Avenger
description:
Description

Asteroid Avenger is similar to the Dinosaur Game as it gets gradually faster over time. Currently, it has two songs and one menu, however, it is in early development. 

The objective is to avoid the asteroids and survive the longest, your score is based on the time you survive. 

Controls

L&R or A & D - Left/Right movement

ESC - exit game

Space - restart at game over menu 

Upcoming

Lasers, multiple lives, shields, textures, fonts, menus, and more will be added in later updates, however, it is in a playable condition.

Currently it features 2D with 3D graphics, that look will be maintained in future updates, however, new shaders and render textures will be added, as well as a background and more. 

Additional Information

If you have any ideas for additions or any concerns, post in the comments or send me an email!

(If your computer drops below 20fps, you will have gameplay problems, contact me if this is an issue)
